title: Dessert Fork And Knife, "Flaches Modell (Flat Model)", 1903
markings: Stamped "WW" (for Wiener Werkstaette) and Austrian silver standard marks: knife:Greyhound head; fork: head of Diana and Greyhound head
provenance: Hertha Jaeger, member of the family of Magda Mautner von Markhof; Estate of Magda Mautner; 2002: acquired by the Museum
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Applied Arts and Industrial Design, General Acquisitions Endowment, and Morrill Acquisitions Funds
description: Flat, rectangular in form, handle tapering very slightly towards head; four tines, the head with very, very slight cupping shape; four hollow beads attached at bottom edge of handle.

tombstone.epitaph: Dessert Fork And Knife, "Flaches Modell (Flat Model)", 1903. Silver. Museum purchase from Friends of Applied Arts and Industrial Design, General Acquisitions Endowment, and Morrill Acquisitions Funds. 2002-3-1/2.
